user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: This screenshot displays the product page for the Apple MacBook Air 13-inch on Amazon. The page includes a product image, with a price of $967.50, and offers the option to choose between three colors: Silver, Gold, and Space Gray. The product has a 5-star rating from 13,312 reviews, and it is labeled as "Climate Pledge Friendly." The page also shows options to scroll through more product images.
